Header.title: Kitty Kad
Header.paragraph: First cute meme token for the Kadena blockchain

About.paragraph: Kitty Kad is a meme token designed to bring some light-hearted fun to the Kadena ecosystem. Hopefully it brings a wider and casual audience to the existing ecosystem, or at the very least generates some buzz

Highlights.name: Fair launch
Highlights.text: All created tokens will be added to the LP

Highlights.name: Clear roadmap
Highlights.text: To keep the community engaged as adoption grows

Highlights.name: Open-source code
Highlights.text: The contract will be available publicly for anyone to audit and verify

Highlights.name: Own history
Highlights.text: By owning one of the first meme tokens on Kadena

Highlights.name: Easily tradable
Highlights.text: Trade it like other tokens on Kadena as it implements an ERC20-like interface

Highlights.name: Social media
Highlights.text: Follow our updates on Reddit, Twitter or Discord

Roadmap.title: Token launch - Q4 '21
Roadmap.text: Fair launch will happen across DEX's on the Kadena ecosystem

Roadmap.title: NFTs - Q1 '22
Roadmap.text: Cat themed NFTs coming to the Kadena blockchain

Roadmap.title: Games and Dapps - Q2 '22
Roadmap.text: Community themed games and dapps linked to the Kitty Kad token

Roadmap.title: Cross-chain - H2 '22
Roadmap.text: By using Kadena's bridges, the token will be available on other chains to allow more users to join

Tokenomics.title: 100M Fixed Supply
Tokenomics.text: No inflation or deflation, however burning for NFTs will be possible

Tokenomics.title: Community Launch
Tokenomics.text: All initial supply will go straight to Dexs

Tokenomics.title: Airdrops
Tokenomics.text: Some tokens will be bought by the team for community airdrops

Socials.link: Fair launch will happen across DEX's on the Kadena ecosystem
